Testing VPSUBUSW instruction
==========================
Test 1: 128-bit basic functionality
Input: 60000 30000 15000 0 65535 32768 1 50000 
Subtrahend: 30000 60000 20000 1 1 1 2 50000 
Result: 30000 0 0 0 65534 32767 0 0 
Expected: 30000 0 0 0 65534 32767 0 0 
[PASS]

Test 2: 128-bit memory operand
Input: 65535 0 1 32768 60000 30000 15000 50000 
Subtrahend (mem): 1 1 2 1 30000 60000 20000 50000 
Result: 65534 0 0 32767 30000 0 0 0 
Expected: 65534 0 0 32767 30000 0 0 0 
[PASS]

Test 3: 256-bit AVX operation
Input: 60000 30000 15000 0 65535 32768 1 50000 60000 30000 15000 0 65535 32768 1 50000 
Subtrahend: 30000 60000 20000 1 1 1 2 50000 30000 60000 20000 1 1 1 2 50000 
Result: 30000 0 0 0 65534 32767 0 0 30000 0 0 0 65534 32767 0 0 
Expected: 30000 0 0 0 65534 32767 0 0 30000 0 0 0 65534 32767 0 0 
[PASS]

VPSUBUSW tests PASSED
